title: Ruwei
alternative_title: 入味 ; rù wèi ; 入味 この娘と食卓を囲む日から ; Ruwei ~Kono Musume to Shokutaku o Kakomu hi Kara~ ; Flavorful ; 루웨이
status: 入味 ; rù wèi ; 入味 この娘と食卓を囲む日から ; Ruwei ~Kono Musume to Shokutaku o Kakomu hi Kara~ ; Flavorful ; 루웨이
description:
Description :
        While getting a nighttime snack, the female artist Xin Xin accidentally saves Yin Yin, a wasted rich girl. She gives her a bath, changes her clothes, and even makes her a bowl of *suantang* noodles after much wheedling...After multiple attempts at rebuffing her forward advances, Xin Xin ends up letting the "homeless" Yin Yin stay with her as she needs a roommate.Social and beautiful, Yin Yin breaks the ice bit by bit with the strict and independent Xin Xin... Their yuriful table for two starts becoming available now!---**Links:**- (https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc33027)

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 3: This Soup's Sourness Hits Different!
